faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about AyarCare's plant disease detection and treatment recommendations.

accuracy.question: How accurate is AyarCare's disease detection?
accuracy.answer: Our AI system has been trained on thousands of plant disease images and can identify over 50 common plant diseases with 95% accuracy. However, for critical decisions, we always recommend consulting with local agricultural experts.

plantTypes.question: What types of plants can AyarCare identify diseases for?
plantTypes.answer: Currently, AyarCare can identify diseases in common garden plants, vegetables, fruits, and ornamental plants. We're continuously expanding our database to include more plant varieties.

photoTips.question: What are the best practices for taking photos for disease detection?
photoTips.answer: Take clear, well-lit photos that show the affected parts of the plant. Capture multiple angles of the symptoms and include some healthy parts for comparison when possible.

treatment.question: Are the treatment recommendations organic?
treatment.answer: We provide both organic and conventional treatment options. Our organic recommendations focus on natural solutions like neem oil, beneficial insects, and cultural practices, while conventional options include approved chemical treatments.

dataSecurity.question: Is my data secure when using AyarCare?
dataSecurity.answer: Yes, we take data privacy seriously. All images and information you upload are processed securely and are not shared with third parties. We comply with all relevant data protection regulations.

offline.question: Can I use AyarCare offline?
offline.answer: While our AI analysis requires an internet connection, you can browse educational resources and view previously saved information offline. We're working on expanding offline capabilities in future updates.
